name.ja: <ruby>破<rt>は</rt></ruby><ruby>滅<rt>めつ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby><ruby>導<rt>どう</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Shuffle 4 Spellcaster and/or Dragon Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: 1 face-up monster on your field cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap Card effects this turn. Also, you can Set 1 "Dark Revelation" from your Graveyard in your Spell & Trap Zone.
